thread.title: Senate bill aims to make it a federal offense to recklessly fly drones
thread.title_full: Senate bill aims to make it a federal offense to recklessly fly drones

title: Senate bill aims to make it a federal offense to recklessly fly drones
text:
Senate bill aims to make it a federal offense to recklessly fly drones 
Published By: Computerworld.com - Today 
A bill was introduced in the U.S. Senate on Wednesday that will make it a misdemeanor, punishable by a fine or imprisonment for up to a year...
